title: Feedback Center
loginRequired: Login is required to create feedback.
description: This is a space where you can write and check feedback such as bug reports and suggestions. Inappropriate language usage and problematic behavior may result in restrictions on using the Feedback Center.

statusExplanation.title: Status Description
statusExplanation.open: OPEN status means the developer has not yet reviewed the feedback. Once reviewed, it will be changed to IN_PROGRESS status.
statusExplanation.closed: CLOSED status means that action has been completed for the feedback. Additional comments cannot be added to maintain the original content.

detail.author: Author
detail.commentPlaceholder: Please write your additional comment. Inappropriate language usage and problematic behavior may result in restrictions on using the Feedback Center.
detail.closedExplanation: The administrator has changed the status of this feedback to CLOSED, so no further comments can be added.
detail.loginRequired: Login is required to add comments.
